sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Against the apple of the left eye of antichrist, or the masse book of lurking darknesse making way for the apple of the right eye of antichrist, the compleat masse book of palpable darknesse : this apple of the left eye, commonly called, the liturgie, or service book, is in great use both among the halting papists, and compleat papists, and the things written heere are also against the compleat masse book. Lightbody, George.
80, [8] p.
s.n.], [Holland : 1638.
Attributed to Lightbody by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Place of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.). Signatures: A-E⁸ [star]⁴. Error in paging: p. 18-19 misnumbered 22-23. Imperfect: stained and tightly bound. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
=======

Lightbody, George.
80, [8] p.
s.n.], [Holland : 1638.
